So 3 episodes into the Frieza saga now

But still
That's excessive

Fights last WAAAAY to long. Especially for how long the fight is supposed to last in real time.

topics.body:
Seriously though the power levels of characters in DBZ is so inconsistent
Like on the way to earth, Vegeta destroyed an entire planet with one blast

After that point, I'm pretty sure if you slam a guy with full power into the ground, even if he survives, he should just fly straight through the earth

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55177305636872431d4c0600#post_55177305636872431d4c0600
Even as Noble as Goku is lets be honest.

Goku kind of is at fault for the planet being blown up so many times. 

"GOKU HE'S POWERING UP AND IS ABOUT TO BLOW UP THE PLANET!"

"Nah man I got to have a fair good ass fight"

"GOKU HE'S GOING TO KILL EVERYONE"

"Nah man I can handle this"

"GOKU YOUR WIFE IS PREGNANT AND WILL ALSO DIE!"

"Nah man I got to have a good fight man, Gotta represent"

"NIGGA ARE YOU STUPID"
